title: Phase 7 - Automation Migration
changes_summary: Successfully migrated automation system from Derivable : Prop to DerivationTree : Type. Updated 51 locations across 3 files: changed all Aesop rules from theorem to def, updated all constructor references, updated metaprogramming code (mkAppM calls), and updated macros. All automation modules compile successfully with no errors.
recommendation: Proceed to Task 76 (Test Suite Migration). All automation files are compiling and ready for testing.
